values: 早期的；初期的；提前的；提早的；早熟的；先前的；起初的；先行的；领先的
提前；早期；早先；一大早；清晨；在开始阶段；在初期；在早期；较早时；较早地；事先；预先；先前；在开始阶段

word_group.phrase: The early bird catches the worm.

word_group.brief_definition: 捷足先登, 捷足先得
word_group.phrase: the early bird catches the worm

word_group.brief_definition: 早起者, 赶早者；早到者；捷足先登者

bilingual.source: There were lots of animals in early cartoons.
bilingual.target: 早期的卡通片中有很多动物。

bilingual.source: In his early films, Mickey was unlucky and had many problems.
bilingual.target: 在他早期的电影中，米老鼠很不幸，有很多问题。
她的祖父母是早期的移民。

bilingual.source: Archaeopteryx is an early type of bird.
bilingual.target: 始祖鸟是一种早期的鸟类。
许多早期的科学实验都涉及以太。

bilingual.source: The early seismograph was invented by the Chinese.
bilingual.target: 早期的地动仪是由中国人发明的。

bilingual.source: Early prodromal symptoms include fever and fatigue.
bilingual.target: 早期的前驱症状包括发热和疲劳。

bilingual.source: A health screener can detect early signs of illness.
bilingual.target: 健康筛选工具可以检测出早期的疾病迹象。

bilingual.source: Early training laid a solid foundation for his career.
bilingual.target: 早期的训练为他的职业生涯打下了坚实的基础。

bilingual.source: The early sales figures bode well for the new product.
bilingual.target: 早期的销售数据预示新产品的前景良好。

list.abstract: early([英][ˈɜːli][美][ˈɜːrli])，英文单词，词性为形容词、副词、名词。作形容词时意为早期的、早熟的、提前的；作副词时意为提早、在早期；作名词时意为人名（厄尔利）。组词有Early Spring（早春）、Early stage（早期阶段）、Early effect（厄利效应 ）。 early，近义词有precocious、inchoate、before one's time等。

yingyinNormal.en: What are you doing here so early?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在这里做什么？

yingyinNormal.en: When we first spoke, you mentioned early fall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们第一次谈时，你说初秋。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on. It's still early. Let's do something.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在还太早了，咱们找点事儿做吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I have to say, the early results are impressive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我必须承认前期的成果令人惊叹。

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't really know you were coming home early.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我没想到你会提前回来。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: How early are we? Oh, actually, we're an hour late.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们早到很久吗？其实我们晚到了一个小时。

yingyinNormal.en: You're early. Well, yeah, we need to talk. What's up?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你来得真早是啊。我们得谈谈。什么事？

yingyinNormal.en: Morning sir. Our days here in the jungle started early.
yingyinNormal.zh: 早上好，先生！生活在这里得习惯早起。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, you're in early.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你来得真早啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow, Pedro is early. Yes, and you are late. You're slow coaches. Pedro likes being early. Everybody likes being early.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哇，佩德罗到的好早！是的，你们吃到了。你是一辆缓慢的客车。佩德罗喜欢早到。大家都喜欢早到。

yingyinNormal.en: Our sample size has just honestly been too small. It's too early. It's still early.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的抽样还不够，现在评判还为时尚早。

yingyinNormal.en: George. It's too early. Dine-Saw. Go back to bed. It sounds like someone's up bright and early. Happy Birthday, George.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治天还很早呢！恐龙！快到你的床上去！好像有人起得比小鸟还早呢!生日快乐乔治!

yingyinNormal.en: So when you said, "Get up early," did you mean 1986?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说要早起，是指1986年？

yingyinNormal.en: It is Peppa's Birthday. It is very early in the morning.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天是佩奇的生日。现在天才刚亮。

yingyinNormal.en: It is Peppa's Birthday. It is very early in the morning.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天是佩琪的生日。现在天才刚亮。

yingyinNormal.en: Today is George's birthday. It is very early in the morning.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天是乔治的生日。现在天才刚刚亮。

yingyinNormal.en: Hang on, I'm gonna give you a little early Christmas present.
yingyinNormal.zh: 稍等，我提前送你个圣诞节小礼物。

yingyinNormal.en: Some days I would get there extra early to watch the sunrise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有时我会起个大早，只为去看日出。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello ducks. Madame Gazalle and Pedro have arrived, back at the playgroup. Where is the bus? Maybe we are early. Yes, Pedro. For once you are early.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好，鸭子们。羚羊夫人和佩德罗已经到幼儿园了。巴士在哪呢？也许我们到太早了。是的，佩德罗。你总算早到了一次了。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, there. Hey, you're early. The movie doesn't start for an hour.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们好啊。你们早到了，电影还有一个小时才开始呢。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: occurring near the beginning or before the usual time

examination_example.sentence: During the 1840s and 1850s, in the <highlight>early</highlight> days of photography, exposure times were notoriously long.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在19世纪40年代至50年代——摄影的早期时代，曝光时间长是众所周知的。

examination_example.sentence: However, Cortina said, <highlight>early</highlight> exposure is beneficial.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，科尔蒂纳说，早期接触是有益的。

examination_example.sentence: From the <highlight>earliest</highlight> days of the Renaissance, the writing of history meant recounting the exemplary lives of great men.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从文艺复兴早期开始，历史的书写就意味着讲述伟人的模范生活。

sense_info_list.en: before the usual or expected time

examination_example.sentence: This could lead to the rats better remembering having freed it <highlight>earlier</highlight>, and wanting the robot to return the favour.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这使得活老鼠更好地记住自己早先解救过它（社交机器鼠），并希望社交机器鼠会回报。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>earlier</highlight> they learn that they have the power to do that, the better.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们越早知道自己有能力做到这一点，就越好。

examination_example.sentence: Those who can sit it <highlight>earlier</highlight> should be allowed to do so.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 应该准许有能力提前通过的学生参加考试。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 早期的; 开始阶段的
早到的; 提早; 提前

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: occurring near the beginning or before the usual time
sense_info_list.zh: 早期的; 开始阶段的

examination_example.sentence: We thought you had disappeared on holiday <highlight>early</highlight> or something.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们还以为你去度假了或者什么的。

examination_example.sentence: It was quite a feat, given where she had been two years <highlight>earlier</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考虑到她两年前的处境，这是一项了不起的成就。

sense_info_list.en: before the usual or expected time
sense_info_list.zh: 早到的; 提早; 提前

examination_example.sentence: The trick, then, is to reach the third stage sooner by focusing <highlight>earlier</highlight> and more closely on fatal accidents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么，诀窍就是通过更早，更密切地关注致命事故，更早地进入第三阶段。

word_usage.usage:
early作副词，表“在初期，在早期”，常见表达有early in the week/ year/ morning：一周开始时/年初/一大早。
示例：这件事发生于1980年1月初的一个寒冷的早晨。
误 It happened on a cold morning in the early of January,1980.
正 It happened on a cold morning early in January,1980.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 早到的; 提早; 提前

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: occurring near the beginning or before the usual time

examination_example.sentence: Are you free to come over for a coffee <highlight>early</highlight> next week?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下周初你有空过来喝杯咖啡吗？

examination_example.sentence: The findings of the latest research were similar to an <highlight>earlier</highlight> multi-state study of assisted living.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项最新研究的结果与早先的一项关于辅助生活的多状态研究相似。

examination_example.sentence: They had to work from <highlight>early</highlight> morning till late at night.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们不得不从清晨工作到深夜。

sense_info_list.en: before the usual or expected time
sense_info_list.zh: 早到的; 提早; 提前

examination_example.sentence: Arrive 10 minutes <highlight>earlier</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提前10分钟到达。

examination_example.sentence: Stimulate their interest as <highlight>early</highlight> as possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽早激发他们的兴趣。

examination_example.sentence: "I planted the seeds <highlight>early</highlight>, " he says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “我很早就种下了种子，”他说。

sense_info_list.en: earlier before the present time or the time mentioned

examination_example.sentence: She should have repainted her house much <highlight>earlier</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她早该把房子重新刷一遍了。

examination_example.sentence: An <highlight>early</highlight> study gave participants abundant time to complete problem-solving and word-association exercises.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 早期的一项研究给了参与者充足的时间来完成问题解决和单词联想练习。

examination_example.sentence: Its aerial survey team spotted a mum with two babies in Cape Cod Bay a day <highlight>earlier</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的航空勘测队一天前在科德角湾发现了一位带着两个婴儿的妈妈。

word_usage.usage:
early作副词，表“在初期，在早期”，常见表达有early in the week/ year/ morning：一周开始时/年初/一大早。
示例：这件事发生于1980年1月初的一个寒冷的早晨。
误 It happened on a cold morning in the early of January,1980.
正 It happened on a cold morning early in January,1980.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 早期的; 开始阶段的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: before the usual or expected time

examination_example.sentence: From my place to Shelton, we have to drive through the quarters, so we'd better leave <highlight>early</highlight> to avoid the traffic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从我家到Shelton，我们得开车穿过街区，所以我们最好早点离开，以免交通堵塞。

examination_example.sentence: Set your alarm clock an hour <highlight>early</highlight> and push yourself to work out!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把你的闹钟提前一个小时，然后强迫自己去锻炼！

examination_example.sentence: Two weeks <highlight>earlier</highlight>, my son, Ben, had got in touch.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两周前，我的儿子本与我取得了联系。

sense_info_list.en: occurring near the beginning or before the usual time
sense_info_list.zh: 早期的; 开始阶段的

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Early</highlight> fifth-century philosopher St. Augustine famously wrote that he knew what time was unless someone asked him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公元五世纪早期的哲学家St.Augustine曾写过一句名言：他知晓时光是何，但若某公问询，他亦难于词辨。

examination_example.sentence: I always liked drawing as <highlight>early</highlight> as I can remember, so right from then, I knew what I was going to be.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从我记事起，我就一直喜欢画画，所以从那时起，我就知道我会成为什么样的人。

examination_example.sentence: James Brindley is recognized as one of the leading <highlight>early</highlight> canal engineers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 詹姆斯·布林德利被认为是早期运河的主要工程师之一。

examination_example.sentence: They see gender differences <highlight>earlier</highlight> than boys.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们比男孩更早看到性别差异。

examination_example.sentence: Which of the following starts <highlight>earliest</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以下哪一项最早开始？

examination_example.sentence: Following the planned time will ensure you have enough sleep to get to those <highlight>early</highlight> classes and stay wide awake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遵循计划好的时间将确保你有足够的睡眠去上早课并保持完全清醒。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 早到的; 提早; 提前
早期的; 开始阶段的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: The early bird catches the worm.

sense_info_list.en: before the usual or expected time
sense_info_list.zh: 早到的; 提早; 提前

examination_example.sentence: He always arrives <highlight>earlier</highlight> than others, as he has the key to the classroom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他总是比别人早到，因为他有教室的钥匙。

examination_example.sentence: In order to catch the <highlight>early</highlight> bus, we had to stop waiting for them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了赶上早班车，我们不得不停下来等他们。

examination_example.sentence: Learn about it <highlight>early</highlight>, and you won't be hurt easily.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 早点了解，你就不会轻易受伤。

sense_info_list.en: occurring near the beginning or before the usual time
sense_info_list.zh: 早期的; 开始阶段的

examination_example.sentence: Many <highlight>earlier</highlight> experiments with plants in space had used closed rooms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多早期的太空植物实验都使用了封闭的房间。

examination_example.sentence: Mr. Bryant spent his <highlight>early</highlight> school years in Italy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 布莱恩特先生早年在意大利上学。

examination_example.sentence: If you start doing this at an <highlight>early</highlight> age, you will not have to depend on your parents too much.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你从小就开始这样做，你就不用太依赖你的父母。

word_usage.usage:
early作副词，表“在初期，在早期”，常见表达有early in the week/ year/ morning：一周开始时/年初/一大早。
示例：这件事发生于1980年1月初的一个寒冷的早晨。
误 It happened on a cold morning in the early of January,1980.
正 It happened on a cold morning early in January,1980.
